ygData.subject: Re: About cancel magic
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is unfortunately true, as I found out last night in Splitpaw. When drowsy was cast on me by the gnoll shaman, I used cancel magic to remove it, but
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:37 AM 5/28/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
>Understand this (at least last time I tried it a month ago), Cancel
>Magic will remove an effect at random. It is not effetive because it
>normally removes a nice Buff you want to have on. Try it out on your
>friends when they have 3 or more buffs on...cancel them out and see
>which one goes first.
>
> -Ziff


This is unfortunately true, as I found out last night in Splitpaw. When
"drowsy" was cast on me by the gnoll shaman, I used cancel magic to remove
it, but it always removed my shielding spell first. That sucked.

Greg (Kronan)
